query.queryinfo: SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject], [System.NodeName], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [System.ChangedDate] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' AND [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] CONTAINS '[SWBU_69_SP4]' AND [System.NodeName] IN ('Heart', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Lung Nodule', 'Dual Energy Analysis', 'Dental Application', 'Colon Analysis', 'Body Perfusion', 'Bone Structure Analysis', 'Lung Density Analysis', 'Report', 'Review 4D', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'FFR', 'Brain Perfusion_CT_3D', 'App2', 'AppCom', 'AppCommon') AND [System.State] IN ('Assigned', 'New') AND ( [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] < @today OR [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] >= '2020-12-2T00:00:00.0000000' ) AND [System.AssignedTo] NOT CONTAINS 'CCB' AND [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] CONTAINS '[SWBU_69_SP4]' AND [UI.bug.keyword] NOT CONTAINS 'H3' ORDER BY [System.State], [System.NodeName]

SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [System.NodeName], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [System.CreatedDate] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' AND (( [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' AND [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] CONTAINS '[HSW-uWS-CT]' ) OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\uInnovation' OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\MCSF1' OR [System.NodeName] = 'Report' ) AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' AND ( [System.State] = 'New' OR [System.State] = 'Assigned' ) AND [System.NodeName] IN ('Heart', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Lung Nodule', 'Dual Energy Analysis', 'Dental Application', 'Colon Analysis', 'Body Perfusion', 'Bone Structure Analysis', 'Lung Density Analysis', 'Report', 'Review 4D', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'Brain Perfusion_CT_3D') AND [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] NOT CONTAINS '[SWBU_69_SP4]' AND [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] NOT CONTAINS '[SWBU_71]' AND [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] NOT CONTAINS '[SWBU_69SP4_R2]' AND [System.AssignedTo] NOT CONTAINS 'CCB' ORDER BY [System.State], [System.NodeName]

select [System.Id], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject], [System.NodeName], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [System.ChangedDate] from WorkItems where [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' and (([System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' and [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] contains '[HSW-uWS-CT]') or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\uInnovation' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\MCSF1' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\CT\For HSW' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MR\uMR\MCSF' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MR\uMR\UIDeal_AWS' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MI\SW\For HSW BU' or [System.NodeName] = 'Report') and [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' and [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' and [System.NodeName] in ('Heart', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Lung Nodule', 'Dual Energy Analysis', 'Dental Application', 'Colon Analysis', 'Body Perfusion', 'Bone Structure Analysis', 'Lung Density Analysis', 'Report', 'Review 4D', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'FFR', 'Brain Perfusion_CT_3D', 'App2', 'AppCommon', 'AppCom') and ([System.IterationPath] under 'Task\HSW\SWBU_69_SP4' or [System.IterationPath] under 'Task\HSW\SWBU_69_SP3') and [System.CreatedDate] >= @today order by [System.State], [System.NodeName]
query.additionalqueryinfo: select [System.Id], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject], [System.NodeName], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [System.ChangedDate] from WorkItems where [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' and (([System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' and [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] contains '[HSW-uWS-CT]') or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\uInnovation' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\MCSF1' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\CT\For HSW' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MR\uMR\MCSF' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MR\uMR\UIDeal_AWS' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MI\SW\For HSW BU' or [System.NodeName] = 'Report') and [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' and [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' and [System.NodeName] in ('Heart', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Lung Nodule', 'Dual Energy Analysis', 'Dental Application', 'Colon Analysis', 'Body Perfusion', 'Bone Structure Analysis', 'Lung Density Analysis', 'Report', 'Review 4D', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'FFR', 'Brain Perfusion_CT_3D', 'App2', 'AppCommon', 'AppCom') and ([System.IterationPath] under 'Task\HSW\SWBU_69_SP4' or [System.IterationPath] under 'Task\HSW\SWBU_69_SP3') and [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate] >= @today and [System.State] in ('Resolved', 'Verified', 'Closed') order by [System.State], [System.NodeName]

query.queryinfo: SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject], [System.NodeName], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [System.ChangedDate] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' AND (( [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' AND [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] CONTAINS '[HSW-uWS-CT]' ) OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\uInnovation' OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\MCSF1' OR [System.NodeName] = 'Report' ) AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Design' AND [System.NodeName] IN ('Heart', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Lung Nodule', 'Dual Energy Analysis', 'Dental Application', 'Colon Analysis', 'Body Perfusion', 'Bone Structure Analysis', 'Lung Density Analysis', 'Report', 'Review 4D', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'FFR', 'Brain Perfusion_CT_3D') AND [UI.bug.keyword] CONTAINS '69SP4H3' AND [System.Title] CONTAINS 'Design_Func' AND ( [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] = '' OR [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] > '2021-01-22T00:00:00.0000000' OR [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] < @today ) AND [System.State] IN ('New', 'Assigned') ORDER BY [System.NodeName], [System.State]
